verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The field was terribly vicious For the tourney list that day A Baby Knight from Ansteorra Seemed poised to have his way

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: So when Jago was one-shotted And Bertrond had lost both arms A mood of deep depression Fell over the Outlands Charms

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The lesser fighters bereft of lives Made way back to the camp But the older Outlands fighters Would stay to see the champ

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: They said "If only Casey Had had a chance to fight We'd have a chance to win our luck Against this Rhino-Hide

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Then suddenly their eyes lit up A cry rose from their Lords It echoed off the polearms It rattled off the swords

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: It rumbled through the valley Where Outlandish fighters healed For Casey, Mighty Casey Was about to take the field

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: His helm was brightly shining His leathers richly tanned His breastplate layered titanium (Which cost him half a grand)

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: The shield upon his mighty arm Was golden from afar Between his teeth he coolly clenched A really good cigar

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: The Outlands fighters now revived Together in one light Would cheer the mighty Casey on In this, his greatest fight

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: There was ease in Casey's manner As his new opponent met His hands were steady as a rock His brow was free of sweat

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: "One quick blow" he murmured As he looked up to the sky Then bowing only to his Queen He launched into the fight

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: The cool is drained from Casey's face His eyes are hard and keen And all along his sun-drenched brow Great furrows can be seen

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: And now he calmly grips his sword And now he makes his throw And Now The Air Is SHATTERED By the force of Casey's blow

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Oh somewhere in the Knowne Worlde There is a Happy Place Where Gentle Lords and Ladies Lie oblivious in their grace

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: But there is no joy in the Outlands Upon this sultry night For the foe of Mighty Casey Has called his great blow "Light"
